trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> objects.
A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the details of an individual attribute within the configuration.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
A one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
array is `null`.
The property of array is less than + index.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref>.

Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information required to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
info is `null`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object in the collection, based on the specified property name.
The name of the configuration attribute contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref>
object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
